mapper.select: SELECT PM.PRIVATE_MENU_ID, PM.CUP, PM.ACCOUNT_ID, PM.MENU_ID, PM.SHOT, PM.SYRUP, PM.WHIPPED_CREAM, PM.DRIZZLE, PM.SIZE, PM.OPTION_SUM, PM.PRICE, M.MENU_NAME, M.CATEGORY1, M.CATEGORY2 FROM SGT_PRIVATE_MENU PM JOIN SGT_MENU M ON PM.MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID WHERE PM.ACCOUNT_ID=#{ account_id }
